title: Plat 4+ team "The Villains" Serious Team, apply if no lifer.
body: All positions are currently filled for the team, feel free to add me in client if you would like to have yourself put down as a  potential fill for the team if someone jumps the boat.

replies.body:
Plat 4, reached plat 2 a few weeks ago
Main adc, 
can play all roles to standard except support

IGN: Animecrack

hi my IGN IS GUPAETOS
im plat 5 but i dont believe i deserve it add me ND TEST ME IF U WANT
add Izou on league and ill add you on my main. hit us up for u need another player
It's to weed out boosts but feel free to apply if plat 5 "Plat 4+ (Exceptions for plat 5 possible, just require you to show you can play)"
